unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Are You REALLY Knowing Your Followers?**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Are You REALLY Knowing Your Followers?**

unnormalised: Hey folks, time to ditch the guesstimates! Follower analytics are getting a serious upgrade. Think beyond just likes and comments. We're talking DEEP dives.
normalised: Hey folks, time to ditch the guesstimates! Follower analytics are getting a serious upgrade. Think beyond just likes and comments. We are talking D E E P dives.

unnormalised: Turns out, knowing if your followers in Mumbai are actually *buying* that new saree endorsed by Neha is crucial, right?
normalised: Turns out, knowing if your followers in Mumbai are actually *buying* that new saree endorsed by Neha is crucial, right?

unnormalised: New tools are letting brands see beyond the surface. Are they mostly from South Delhi? Age bracket? Do they engage with content from IIT Delhi? Understanding this stuff is like finding the secret sauce for your campaign.
normalised: New tools are letting brands see beyond the surface. Are they mostly from South Delhi? Age bracket? Do they engage with content from I I T Delhi? Understanding this stuff is like finding the secret sauce for your campaign.

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma from IIM Bangalore suggests that focusing on QUALITY followers – those genuinely interested in your brand – is way more valuable than vanity metrics. Think engagement over inflated numbers.
normalised: Doctor Sharma from I I M Bangalore suggests that focusing on Q U A L I T Y followers – those genuinely interested in your brand – is way more valuable than vanity metrics. Think engagement over inflated numbers.

unnormalised: Platforms like InstaAnalytica are promising to help brands filter out fake accounts and pinpoint genuine interests. One agency in Chennai reported a 30% increase in ROI using advanced analytics, even with a smaller, more targeted audience.
normalised: Platforms like InstaAnalytica are promising to help brands filter out fake accounts and pinpoint genuine interests. One agency in Chennai reported a thirty percent increase in R O I using advanced analytics, even with a smaller, more targeted audience.

unnormalised: Spending big Rs. on influencers with millions of followers? Make sure those followers are actually your potential customers! It's about smart investing, folks. Forget about just covering a 1000 sq ft area, think hyper-local and ultra-relevant.
normalised: Spending big rupees on influencers with millions of followers? Make sure those followers are actually your potential customers! It is about smart investing, folks. Forget about just covering a one thousand square feet area, think hyper-local and ultra-relevant.
